title: Therapy Services | Mind Body Co-op | Chicago, IL 60602
description: Mind Body Co-op provides quality therapy services in Chicago Illinois. Counseling available in English, Arabic, Spanish, and Polish
cleaned_text: Services We realize that no two people are the same and as such tailor our therapy to meet the specific needs of our clients. Whether you are struggling with anxiety, depression or any other issue, we will help you recognize underlying problems, fully realize your strengths and adjust certain behaviors and thoughts to see things a different, healthier way. We also know how hard it is to reach out and get started with a therapist. We are committed to doing everything we can to make your next steps as easy as possible. Our team is available for consultation about what service, or combination of services, will align with your individual goals to navigate your best life. Our practice specializes in treating individuals, couples, and families and we offer comprehensive services Body Co-op's psychotherapists have experience working with diverse individuals from different backgrounds, religions, and cultures. Our psychotherapists appreciate the complexity of every individual. Additionally, approach treatment from a trauma-informed lens and build on the unique strengths and experiences of each person. Mind Body Co-op believes human gender identity and sexuality exist on a spectrum. It is normal to be gay, lesbian, bisexual, transgender, or gender non-conforming or two-spirited, queer, questioning, or asexual. It is normal to be kinky or to have lesser-known sexual interests. If you are experiencing distress as a result of stigma, trauma, or societal oppression related to your sexual orientation or your gender identity, we're here, we're queer, and we're ready to support and accept you. With compassion and support, our psychotherapists integrate methodologies that complement the needs and goals of each individual. Reach out for support to start mapping your road to
